meanings.definition: The education of both sexes in the same institution.
meanings.sent1: Coeducation allows boys and girls to learn together in school.
meanings.sent2: My school practices coeducation, so I have both male and female classmates.
meanings.sent3: The idea of coeducation made the students excited for the new school year.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of knowledge, coeducation is the seed that grows equality.
meanings.sent5: Coeducation promotes a harmonious learning environment for all students.

meanings.definition: The practice of educating males and females together.
meanings.sent1: Coeducation has been beneficial in promoting gender equality in schools.
meanings.sent2: I believe in the importance of coeducation for a balanced society.
meanings.sent3: The school's decision to implement coeducation led to interesting classroom dynamics.
meanings.sent4: In the journey of knowledge, coeducation is the bridge that connects boys and girls.
meanings.sent5: Coeducation fosters mutual respect and understanding among students.
